description:
Achieving and exceeding your fitness goals, has never looked so good. Outfitted with a brilliant AMOLED display the Forerunner 965 brings a new level of clarity and detail to your training sessions. With features like training readiness, that lets you know if your body is ready for that next training session, and evolving personalized daily workouts, the 965 makes it easier than ever to find your next level. The touchscreen makes scrolling and zooming through the pre-loaded maps, or any course you create, feel natural. Onboard multiband GPS pulls in speed, distance, and location data. While other sensors pay attention to how and where you train, factoring elevation and temperature into your performance. Running power and running dynamics now come right from your watch, no more accessories needed. Each morning the 965 delivers your morning report, summarizing sleep quality, recovery level, training effects, and other clutch training data. When you need extra information, or motivation, you can download training plans through the free Garmin Connect app. Connect lets you review activities, receive texts and other notifications, and more. Through your phone, the 965 can connect to multiple music services and can even hold up to 1000 songs. With music and mapping right on your wrist, phone-free runs are looking better and better.

  • AMOLED colour touchscreen has deep blacks and vibrant colours making it crisp, clear, and easy to read in any light
  • Tough, non-reflective Gorilla Glass® 3 DX face and a rugged titanium bezel
  • Built-in modes for biking, running, swimming (indoor and outdoor), multisport, gym focused activities (strength training – with rep counter, cardio and elliptical training, stair stepping, indoor rowing and yoga) and more
  • Running dynamics off your wrist, providing running power, cadence, ground contact time, stride length, vertical oscillation, vertical ratio and ground contact time
  • Free global maps include streets and trails, with North America on the device and more regions downloadable from Garmin Express™
  • Point of interest navigation lets you search for places you may want to go
  • Round-trip mapping: enter a distance and the 965 will use tracks from other Garmin users to calculate multiple course options that start and stop right were you are
  • Trendline™ routing uses Garmin Connect’s database of routes and finds the most popular way to get you where you are going
  • Stream music through a paired smartphone using Spotify, iHeartRadio, Pandora or Deezer. Or, download playlists and podcasts via your favourite music service, e.g. Spotify (premium account required), you can even drag and drop MP3s from your computer – holds up to 1,000 songs (depending on sound quality)
  • Race widget helps make race day a little less stressful, providing course specific performance info, weather and more
  • Morning report summarizes sleep quality, recovery level, training effects, and even provides a personalized daily workout suggestion
  • ClimbPro™ mode breaks down the climbs in your activity, letting you know the grade, the total ascent, how much more you have to go and displays an elevation profile
  • Strava Segment integration (requires premium) preloaded or on-the-fly via your phone, shows starred segments and results
  • Multi-band signal reception and expanded GNSS support (GPS, GLONASS, Galileo, QZSS and IRNSS)
  • Live Tracking during activities (via phone) allows you to share your location and heart rate
  • UltraTrac™ mode reduces the GPS recording rate, providing up to 34 hours of use
  • Elevate™ optical heart rate monitor provides heart rate and pulse ox data
  • Physiological metrics includes VO2 max – which takes ambient temperature and altitude into consideration, a race predictor, recovery advisor and performance indicator
  • Training readiness and training load modes uses data from your recent workouts (up to 28 days worth) to let you know how ready your body is to train, and if you are overtraining, under-training, or on the right path
  • Heart rate variability (HRV) monitoring is a great tool to predict recovery and how your body is responding to your training
  • Incident detection uses the internal sensors to detect if an accident has occurred. In the case of an accident the unit will send a signal through your paired phone to your emergency contacts, letting them know where you are and that you need help
  • Activity and sleep tracking
  • Rechargeable lithium-ion battery lasts up to 24 hours in GPS mode or 8.5 hours in GPS and music mode, 34 hours in UltraTrac mode and up to 23 days in smartwatch mode – all values based on default display mode
  • In the box: Forerunner 965, USB-C charging cable and documentation
name: Garmin Forerunner 965
